meanings.definition: Dressed in stylish or fashionable clothing.
meanings.sent1: She looked so togged up in her fancy dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: The models on the runway were all togged in the latest designer wear.
meanings.sent3: Even the scarecrow in the field was togged up with a hat and a bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was togged in twinkling lights for the holiday season.
meanings.sent5: The superhero was togged in a colorful costume ready to save the day.

meanings.definition: To dress someone in a particular outfit.
meanings.sent1: She togged her little brother in his superhero costume for Halloween.
meanings.sent2: The stylist togged the celebrity in a stunning gown for the red carpet event.
meanings.sent3: The magician togged the rabbit in a tiny top hat and a bow tie for the show.
meanings.sent4: The designer togged the mannequin in the window display with the latest collection.
meanings.sent5: The parent togged the baby in a cozy onesie before bedtime.
